author: digy
msg: LUCENENET-412 Since we are at a point of loosing "drop-in replacement" we are free to make the changes related with TopDocs
>To get the library to work with VB.Net I found I had to edit TopDocs.cs (src/core/Search/TopDocs.cs).
>Being case-insensitive VB.Net can't differentiate between the three public variables (totalHits, scoreDocs & maxScore) and the three >public properties (TotalHits, ScoreDocs & MaxScore)

author: digy
msg: [LUCENENET-412] This is the first point where we loose "drop-in replacement"
So the new API is like stopWords.Add("this") ( was stopWords.Add("this","this") which I have hated in Lucene.Net most)
